modName: Undead Giants and Mammoths - Retexture Mod
summary: Re-texture of the giants and mammoths to give a more horrific undead aesthetic, perhaps the necromancers had something to do with it?
descriptionHtml:
Ironman5000 Retextures - Undead Giants and Mammoths
===================================================

Changelog 01/02/12: Added glowing features version

Description:

Retexture of the giants and mammoths to give them a more undead look.  If this mod gains enough popularity I will work on more horror themed retextures plus when the Skyrim construction set is finally released I will work on a more in-depth horror/daedric mod.

If you like this mod you might want to try out Gory Draugr (updating soon, see info) http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6803, and Fiendish Falmer (includes useable armour and weapons) http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6955.

Installation:

Extract the folder into the Skyrim data folder, default folder directory should be C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data.  If you have a mod that already retextures
the giants and mammoths then you will be prompted to overwrite files, say yes to all for this mod to take effect.

Uninstallation:

Go to the data\\textures\\actors and remove the giant and mammoth folders AND data\\textures\\weapons, remove the giant folder.  All gone!

Tools used:

BSAopt, the ideal Skyrim BSA extraction program
Gimp 2.0, a really useful and free image editing program
author: Ironman5000
